website_summaries.verdict: This tape measure lacks the fancy features and durability of other models.
pros: Soft rubber coating resists slipping and shock
cons: The locking mechanism may malfunction over time

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down.
customer_reviews.text: I had one for a while and liked it. I purchased 3 more and none of them lock very well as the tape often very slowly slides back in it. Also just threw one in the trash. Once it got to a bit over 23' it was very hard to pull out. When I got to just over 24.5' the rest of the tape yanked completely out of it. Garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G. Roehl

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY. ITS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: I waited 3 months to post a review because I wanted to be accurate. DONT BUY. It’s complete GARBAGE. I use a measuring tape all day for the construction I run. It’s heavy and feels like it should be durable, but the spring loaded spindle inside broke after about 6 weeks, leaving the tape to not go back inside. Save yourself the hassle. Buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sexy rexy green self lock 25-foot power tape measure.
customer_reviews.text: Here's a man toy you gotta get. (Gals, you will like it, too!) You're not likely to lose this tape measure because it's bright green. Best feature is that you don't have to push button for it to stay out. You push button to recall. See my YouTube video of this: Sexy rexy green self lock 25-foot power tape measure. I love the looks of it. The feel of it. The wide, easy to read tape. Super buy!
customer_reviews.author: Rich DavisTop Contributor: Ukuleles

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, Easy operation and Large print on rule!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a 25’ Stanley I’ve had for over 40 years. It is a bit larger and bulkier than the Stanley, but the Stanley was smaller in every way including the print on the rule. I was amazed how smoothly it pulled out and the lovely auto lock feature. No longer do I fear getting sliced by my tape measure! To retract it, gently press on the large green button. It is US measurement only. I’d have liked a combo with metric, but it is easy to convert inches to centimeters. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: CAnne50

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Tape Measure
customer_reviews.text: I own several of these tape measures. They are cost efficient, and well-made. The tape is medium duty, and you can take it out about 6ft or so before in snaps over. I appreciate the self-lock feature, and it retracts smoothly. The retracting mechanism feels solid, and I don't anticipate it failing anytime soon. As long as Komelon continues to put forth quality tools and a decent price point, I will continue to be a customer. Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: InsuranceGuy

customer_reviews.title: good but ugly
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure feels very solid, and I really like the self-locking feature. The housing also is not overly bulky while also not feeling flimsy. The one thing I don't like is the color of the tape itself is just downright ugly. I have a 15 foot version of this same tape measure and the tape is a brilliant green which looks great. This one is more like they mixed the green with a standard yellow tape and this is what happened. Thankfully the color doesn't interfere with what is a great tape measure
customer_reviews.author: MarkoPolo

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 4 different tapes I've bought recently, plus several I already owned, this is my favorite. Granted, that's with limited use so far, so I can't say anything about durability. However, this locking mechanism is fantastic: very smooth deployment, very positive auto lock, and provides complete control over retraction with minimal effort. It fits the hand naturally as well, with a soft rubber grip. Addition: the markings' length difference between 1/16th, 1/8th, & 1/4 are substantial and greater than some other tapes I have, which makes it very easy to read quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure was purchased as a birthday gift for my 10 year old son. Recently he broke my old home tape measure trying to get it to stay open. He loves to measure things and this activity is recommended for his distance learning homework. My son is thrilled that the blade stays open on this model. He also REALLY likes the retraction button. The bright color makes it easy to find. I ended up buying an additional one for myself. Watch the pricing because it is much higher for 2 blades than buying them each individually.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Locking feature
customer_reviews.text: Really like the Automatic Locking feature of this Tape Measure. The reason I ordered this Tape, I already have the 16ft version. Really like that one. Great Performance over 3 years with that one. Update: 05/10/2020 Just for your information, do not leave out in a heavy dew or rain. It does not react well to moisture. Left my new out, it rained. Let it dry out for a week, thought would extend it to clean rust that had already formed & it would not retract the last 7 feet no matter what I tried. So bought 1 more. Have to keep track of it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy m.

customer_reviews.title: Whyyyyy no metric? Everything else is so perfect
customer_reviews.text: The auto lock feature is genius. The button to undo the lock is very convenient, and makes it so that you can control how fast/hard the tape measure will retract. Just pulsate the retraction so that it never gets too fast or dangerous. Nylon coating is sweet and makes the edges less sharp and less dangerous when retracting. BUT NO METRIC UNITS! AHHH WHY. It's so easy to print and adds so much utility. Deeply disappointed at a very basic feature is missing because I'm so deeply impressed by every other ingenious features.... big sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Strategist

customer_reviews.title: Total Crap - broke second use
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace a fat max that tape measure that lasted 10+ years. the auto retraction button became stuck on second use and tape will not go back into the casing. after messing with it for 15 minutes I decided to pull majority of the tape out and try and get it to go back in. now i just have a big mess of metal tape. save yourself the headache and buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me 3 of these for fathers day, sortof joking, but since I can never seem to find a tape measure when I need one I wasn't complaining. They lock by default, and you push the button to release, seemed like a cool idea, but using them actually turned out to be pretty frustrating.. maybe I'm just not able to get used to them, but I've since tried to avoid using these over my traditional tape measures.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: It's wide and easy to read, the color matches my new toolbox, and I can keep this one there for when I need it, in case my everyday one gets lost. I had one before and left it in a store, but this one is much better. The button to retract it works great and it all works so smooth. It's a bit on the heavy side, but that's to be expected since the measure is wider than most. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiya05

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, self-lock convenient, and it’s safe from hand injuries
customer_reviews.text: After 6ft (not 15ft as I said in video), it starts bending, but I figure that’s natural gravity that applies to measuring tapes. One cool thing would be to have the metric system on one part of the measuring tape. That would be a nice addition as you don’t need both sides of it for the imperial system
customer_reviews.author: Nga Duong

customer_reviews.title: Busted
customer_reviews.text: Beware: pull this too far and the roll just pops out. No fixing, no retracting, just pops out and broke for good. Used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing tape measure! I absolutely love it! The locking feature is so helpful. When you press the button, it will close, don't press the button and it is locked (but only from going in, you can still pull it out easily). This is amazing, and I won't ever buy a different tape measure! My only con is that it doesn't have the metric scale on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Bigler

customer_reviews.title: Super Awesome buy. Def RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: MY WIFE & I LOVE IT, way quieter, the numbers are big on it, it does not easily fold when it's extended, it's safe for us and the kids because it has a safety coating on the measuring tape, its self locking is awesome, my wife loves even more, she's not scared to use it. She likes to use this one, LOL I always had to measure things for because she could never get the tape not to fold when extended AND is way quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Fabian Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: bright green is easy to spot
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, bright green is easy to spot. But like most other 25ft tapes, it is bulky and heavy. I love how it automatically holds the tape out until you hit the button to retract. That makes using it a lot easier in the field when my other hand is having to deal with a notepad that I have to write on. I've had it for a few months and the button spring hasn't worn out yet.
customer_reviews.author: AntTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Much Better
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to buy this but my old one's locking mechanism didn't work anymore. The tape still worked but the locking mechanism didn't which made dealing with it frustrating. This one eliminates that concern. I am much happier now. Especially since I was always worried that somehow the old tape measure was going to cut me if I wasn't careful and the blade would slide back without warning.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Nice, until it quit retracting
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about two weeks, nice tape measure, but it quit retracting. They are sending a replacement, and if that one holds up, I will update this review. UPDATE: They have place the replacement on a slow boat from China. I sent in the defective unit 10 days ago, the replacement still isnt shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Not noisy and clunky!
customer_reviews.text: Hey this is a great measuring tape. It has a rubberized exterior, so if you drop it, it isn't going to break or dent. The tape rolls out smoothly and easily. It locks and unlocks easily. But my very favorite part is that when you unlock it, the tape rolls back inside smoothly, not like a wild balloon deflating. This was a great purchase at a great price. :)
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tape measure and amazing auto lock!
customer_reviews.text: First off I LOVE the auto lock feature!!! That feature alone makes this tape measure amazing. Also, it is very easy to pull the tape out. It glides with such ease. I bought this so I could have a tape measure if my own instead of always having to find my husband’s. Well mind is definitely better than his. Ha! I will be checking to see if I can get the exact one in a shorter length to keep in my purse for shopping as this will weigh my purse down.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before purchasing and while some folks had some design issues I can say I have not experienced them. I am not a contractor and I do not use this every day. I am just a handy lady with a big old broken down loft which needs a lot of maintenance. I was so happy to get a tape measure without breaking the bank (my other three seem to have vaporized) and I am very pleased with this product. If I ever need one again I will buy this same product.
customer_reviews.author: elkile

customer_reviews.title: Does it all
customer_reviews.text: I find this a very well made, easy to use, handy tap measure. I misplaced my other tape measure so bought this one and like it so much I don't care if I find the other one. I love the locking feature and rewind. It is bright green and easy to see, so maybe I won't lose this one. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hambone99

customer_reviews.title: well....
customer_reviews.text: It's a retractable ruler. It retracts, it measures, it's easy to read, it locks in place. I'm not that handy, I do what I can, nothing that needs to be THAT precise, fortunately. So, if it's off by an 1/8th of an inch, I wouldn't know it or care. Not that it's off. Or isn't off. I gave it 5 stars for accuracy b/c I'm not qualified to say otherwise. The end.
customer_reviews.author: Southern GalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Makes it more difficult than usual for fine tuning small measurements
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is how the numbers are giant for the 1st foot. If you're measuing something that's a foot, odds are you're not too far away and you can read the numbers without them being so huge. Makes it more difficult than usual for fine tuning small measurements. But I love the self-lock feature. For me, it's a must when it comes to tape measures. That's why I couldn't get my tape measure at Ace Hardware, they had Zer0 self-lock options.
customer_reviews.author: K. G.

customer_reviews.title: Best one ever
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Love that it doesn't snap back when you pull it out. The old style - will snap back unless you lock it. This one stays locked unless you "unlock" it for it to slide back in. Also, it's not that sharp metal material. For anyone who has ever cut their finger when the old style ones snap back with the sharp metal you know what I mean!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape!
customer_reviews.text: So, I threw my Stanley tape away after getting this new one. The Stanley was square, metal, had annoying European measurements which is useless and makes the tape too busy to read. The Stanley was hard to read. This tape is way easier to read, round so more comfortable in your hand along with the rubber grip, perfect. Self lock and release button, something that should be on any tape meas. The only thing to make this perfect would have been White instead of yellow!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the self lock feature
customer_reviews.text: the lock on the measuring tape constantly jams and won't retract. I've had this for less than a month and regret the purchase. The tape locks as it is supposed to but the button to release and retract is stuck. I can't even return it because the tape won't retract. A total inconvenience and waste.
customer_reviews.author: Chara Reed

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months (and only a handful of uses), this measuring tape is broken and will no longer retract. We had to throw it away. I should never have tried to save a few bucks. I wish I had just bought another Dewalt. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: BBW

customer_reviews.title: A large green measuring machine.
customer_reviews.text: One of those items I could have just bought at the store but was super lazy. Well I'm glad I bought this one because that green color is amazing. It seems very sturdy and is very easy to use and the ability to let it slide or lock it off is about as good as it gets for this level of tool. It's pretty heavy and big. If you don't want to Lug something really heavy around you might try to find one that's a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Sand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this tape measure. I've liked the ease of the "Leverlock" type tape measures, but they always get loose and start to reel in when you set them on the workpiece to mark the measurement. I have no such problem here since the button is on top. Smooth operation. I'm a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Measuring Tape!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many measuring tapes but this is the best I've ever had! The quality is superb, the numbers are large enough so you don't have to bend down and quint to read the numbers, the lock feature actually works unlike most! Oh and it's easy to find with the bright green.
customer_reviews.author: Nadylady

customer_reviews.title: Auto locks OPEN when you pull it out.
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure is great because it is the opposite of all the other tape measures out there. It auto locks OPEN when you pull it out. You push to release. Much more convenient to use and it's easy to read and accurate. I buy them for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This Tape Measure is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: seriously if you need a tape measure this one is great. The tape itself is thick, pretty wide, and retracts super easily. The tape itself is very easy to read. The button to retract the tape only needs a light touch. Over all seems pretty sturdy. I imagine itll live in my garage for a lot of years to come.
customer_reviews.author: flying frog

customer_reviews.title: bright color
customer_reviews.text: I love this tape measure . I have needed one all my life . I have thought it would be best to have a little one. Not for me ! I have lost them all. This one you can see, its a tad heavy but not too much.. But you will not misplace it !
customer_reviews.author: debbee

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. I am always misplacing tapes or people run off with them which is why I bought these 2 at a time. Good value for the money and they are easy to read and feel very sturdy. I was tired of spending tons of money on tapes and these are a great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Broke with first use
customer_reviews.text: Broke with first use. I was measuring something large, and the tape came entirely out of the dispenser with the same ease it takes to feed our more tape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Self destructed at 24 feet extension and no customer service respose
customer_reviews.text: I used this tape measure only a couple of times and it was fine until I extended it to 24 feet to measure a room. I was careful not to get close to the 25 foot limit. The tape measure snapped and came completely out. I emailed the company per its website describing the issue and have had no response. Had it happened at 25 feet I would not be writing this review. Too much time spent already on this bad $10 item. Faulty tape measure and zero customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: The locking system broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the tape seemed really good, but the lock tab broke while I was just testing right after I opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kunal

customer_reviews.title: Auto Lock Is A Blessing
customer_reviews.text: The auto-lock feature on this thing is an absolute blessing. No more messing with a slider and fumbling with the tape when you want to measure the height of a wall, just pull the tape out and it stays put until you press the big green button. I honestly can't see any reason why anyone would prefer the old locking method at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Trask

customer_reviews.title: Works great but annoying and useless packaging
customer_reviews.text: Get rid of the clamshell-type packaging and I would give it 5 stars. Works great, LOVE the bigger numbers, and the locking feature is bang on. I’m just tired of unnecessary packaging that takes scissors to free the product .
customer_reviews.author: ChristineB

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My main gripe about any kind of tape measurer is that it always snaps back and kind of scares me and makes it hard where Im fumbling around trying to measure and keep it open prior to locking it. But with this one it makes it so much easier to measure things since it auto locks and stays that way until you snap it .
customer_reviews.author: Peanutbutterpandapuffs

customer_reviews.title: Best measuring tape I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the only thing that is missing to make this perfect is maybe a bubble level or a graphite insert so I can mark the wall without a pencil. But it's a sturdy tape measure, and the tape itself has a pleasant surface (not just bare metal feeling). Numbers are large and clear. The lock feature is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work as a kitchen designer. I recently misplaced my last one ($25 at Sears) when I found these on amazon for a fraction of the cost, I was skeptical, but I bought 2. I know from my previous one that the mechanism that holds the tape open will eventually wear down and it won't stay open, but that took over 2 years for it to happen on my old one. Best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Viki S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped locking after first day
customer_reviews.text: This item worked great at first but after the first day it stopped locking this made me really upset as I was just telling my husband how great of a measuring tape this was now I'm going to have to spend money on another one .. money I don't have :( other than that shipping was super fast & the packaging was nice and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Color
customer_reviews.text: Haha, yes my favorite color is green, so that's a bonus. To be honest I'm really use to my previous tape measure to lock when I push down on the button whereas with this one it auto-locks and releases when you push down on the button. I'll get use to it with a few more uses, no big deal. Works well and smooth! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Scray

customer_reviews.title: Worthless, won't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The idea is that as you pull this out to whatever length it automatically holds its place. EXCEPT... it doesn't do it very well. Even after a few seconds 17" becomes 16 9/10". I'm extremely unsatisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bachrach

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable tape measure
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure is well built and does the job well. Its self lock feature works well and I haven't any issues with it yet. The tape itself is sturdy and can withstand its own weight for about 8 ft without collapsing. The case is ergonomically designed and both easy to use and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Operation
customer_reviews.text: Someone borrowed my old tape and never returned it. I was a bit upset about that until I got this one. It feels so much better in my hand and operates much better, so now I'm glad they kept it! Wish it came in pink!
customer_reviews.author: NtheGarden

customer_reviews.title: Loved how it worked; broke after 5 weeks/10 uses
customer_reviews.text: I actually really liked the self-lock feature of this tape measure. I got it at the end of May, just to measure a space for a desk and a couple other things. I had maybe used it 10x and the self-lock mechanism broke 5 weeks after I got it - just a week past my opportunity to return via Amazon. My partner took it apart and found the broken self-lock piece. I've emailed the company and if they take care of replacing quickly, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy something else, the tape pulled out, retracted part way one time and then never again. What a pile junk. As you can see from the other customer photos this seems to be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: GoClick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I love this tape measure because of its automatically locking feature. I have used other tape measures that are really annoying when they snap back at you. This product makes it so easy to measure. I am also impressed by the durability of the product design. It doesn't look or feel cheap. You can't go wrong with choosing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why, but tape measures are fun. As the kids say, they are very "satisfying." This particular tape measure is really solid and feels of high quality. I had never heard of this brand before, but it's really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lescher

customer_reviews.title: Mechanically sound -- hate the markings!
customer_reviews.text: With one major exception, I am very happy with this tape measure. It is sturdy and easy to old. It retracts easily. I cannot stand the markings. I want to see feet and inches. I do not need also to see 1 F 3 as I can already see that I am three marks past the 1 F mark. And I really do not need to know 16 inch increment marks. Some people use tape measures besides for measuring stud spacing. I find it difficult to see the foot markings because of the other visual noise. See the photo -- perhaps you will be OK with the markings.
customer_reviews.author: stukincalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: This product won’t retract. The first time I opened it and used it I could pull it out fine but the product wouldn’t retract
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Square Trade User

customer_reviews.title: 2 of them both broke
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these and they both broke in the same way. Essentially the coiling stops retracting the tape. One breaking in this way can be a fluke but 2 is design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: djonbrooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these and they work great, especially the lock feature, others you have to lock if you want it to stay fixed, this locks automatically and you gave to press the button to rewind
customer_reviews.author: GEGE43

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well-made . However, it is very heavy. It would be because of the heavy well-made material used to make the tape. I like it that the tape is press to release but not push to lock.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Y. Chang

customer_reviews.title: A Great Tape Measure
customer_reviews.text: First of all it's green. I can find it quickly. The tape has a stop on it when you stop pulling. Particularly handy when you don't have someone around to hold the dumb end of the tape.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O.

customer_reviews.title: My dad tried to steal it from me
customer_reviews.text: So my dad kept telling me to borrow his measuring tape and I declined bc I knew I’d forget to return it. This tape measurer arrives and I showed him and needless to say my dad tried to steal it lol. I don’t know much about utility gadgets but when your father tries to steal it from you, you know it good.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie M

customer_reviews.title: Glad I have this.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, because all homeowners should have one. I measured hallways, windows and closets to make other purchases! It's weighty, but doesn't bother me. Works exactly as supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: You’d think a tape measure is no big deal, but I love this thing. My husband and I just bought a new house and this has been perfect for measuring everything! The lock feature is so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tape stopped working within 100 days of purchase
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure was cleverly designed, but stopped working within 100 days of purchase. The tape would not go in or out, making this item useless. Based on the performance issues, I rate this zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This measuring tape is simple and easy to use. I love the locking action, when you pull the tape out it stays in place so you don't have the issue of the tape jerking back into the casing. The numbers are large and the measuring tape is really durable. I'm very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Madison T. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Big bang for your buck... must buy tape measure!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tape measure.... especially for the affordable price! The self locking feature is such a joy and new, must have feature for tape measures! Rubber grip gives solid grip, weight is balanced in the hand and numerals/ticks are large and easy to read! It also had 16 inch marks for stud spacing! I had the tape measure extended out to 6 ft. Before it started to sag. It finally broke/bent well past 7.5 ft! Buyers will be satisfied with this tape measure!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ho

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get to use this. Once the tape was pulled out, it would NOT retract. I even read the directions. For how to use a tape measure. I have a masters degree. It should NOT be so difficult. It is currently in the trash. Because how do I actually return a tape measure with 25 ft of metal protruding from it. So irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Button is the Issue!
customer_reviews.text: They replaced the slide lock with a button. The button is much more difficult to use than the slide lock, especially when holding with just one hand while measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Taco Mama

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tool
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs tape measure in the house. This one is bright enough not to misplace it once you set it down and the locking feature means I don't need a second person to hold it when measuring larger areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it is going to work great
customer_reviews.text: So I have only owned this for a short period of time, but it seems like it will work great. I was a bit concerned about the automatic locking feature with the button release, as this is the opposite way most tape measures work. That being said, it is pretty handy.
customer_reviews.author: Denis Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The auto lock feature is very strong, tape does not slowly slide back in. Button feels good in hand. Numbers are large. Belt clip is pretty solid an stays on your waist. Dropped it a few times these past 2 weeks onto concrete and its staying alive.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Best measuring tape
customer_reviews.text: This measuring tape is a new design that auto-stop the tape when you pull. With revolutionary design self-lock, the tape became very easy and nice to use when measuring alone.
customer_reviews.author: HOW KIAN BOON

customer_reviews.title: Definitely good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad tape measure. It seems sturdy enough, and easy to read. The locking feature holds the tape well and doesn't scrape it up. I would say for the price it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wansor

customer_reviews.title: Great Measuring-Tape!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a house-warming present so that I could install shelves and furniture, and it works like a breeze! Always comes back when you push the button, without suddenly snapping back and hitting you in the eye like some older models of measuring tape! A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: NICE ...
customer_reviews.text: I was using a bent flimsy measuring tape and it just made me crazy. Then I came across this one day searching for something else and I decided to buy it, and I was more then impressed. I think this is the best tape measure I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: MOONZMAGICK

customer_reviews.title: This tape works great. I has been dropped
customer_reviews.text: This tape works great. I has been dropped, stepped on, kicked and tossed many times during my house renovation project, and it will be abused more. LOL. Works great, and is used OFTEN. I like how it hooked on to ends easily and when you pull it out, it does not auto-retract. It also does not SNAP finished, pinching your fingers, periodically - but I am a novice at this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mid American Dreamers

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It locks automatically, its easy to read, the numbers do shrink after a certain point, but for what i need it for, its prety much as good as it can be!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Wanted BIG numbers for more thann1 foot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the easy to read BIG numbers! Wellll.. that is only for the first foot, then back to small. Maybe I didn’t read the description. They NEED to show pics of numbers beyond one foot.
customer_reviews.author: N. Scherm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was much better than I thought it would be. Good and sturdy. The locking feature and the large numbers are quite convenient. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OEJ

customer_reviews.title: A great tape measure
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for those bigger jobs. Easy to use. The lock feature is awesome. I know, it’s a tape measure but it really is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: the shopper

customer_reviews.title: the first one I returned and got a replacement the second one I was too disgusted to even return it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a few days. Works as advertised. I am just a Do-It-Yourself guy not a contractor. The Stanley 15 foot I bought 9 months ago for carrying into stores to measure stuff still works. I went through 2 Stanley 25 footers in less than a month, the first one I returned and got a replacement the second one I was too disgusted to even return it. This Komelon 25 footer exceeds my expectations and I will always purchase Komelon tape measures in the future. Since I read some reviews I always retract it in short bursts so I have never had the problem of it whipping all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Great measure
customer_reviews.text: Ive always had shorter ones and im so glad i got one longer! The autolock feature is a nice addition makes it easier so it doesnt roll back!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Pope

customer_reviews.title: I really like the auto lock feature
customer_reviews.text: By default this tape measure locks as you extend it. I like this function and makes it easy to use. To retract it you just press the button. Would buy again. Mechanism works well. Feels like good quality construction in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Auto-lock mechanism seems pretty prone to failure
customer_reviews.text: Unlock mechanism for the “magic auto-lock” seems to snag quite frequently and broke permanently after only the second use. The tape measure now won’t retract at all. Unfortunately this happened just a few days after the return window. Would strongly advise going with the regular old manual lock-out and avoid gimmicks that are susceptible to critical failure that could render them completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for small projects
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used different this tape measure for a month and so far it has remained retractable- although it requires assistance retracting if the tape is pulled out farther than 6 feet.
customer_reviews.author: missy mo

customer_reviews.title: Self lock is awesome
customer_reviews.text: The case is mostly made of plastic unlike my old Stanley measure tape. The self locking feature is great, with it I won't need to contineouly pulling out tape and try to lock while trying to ensure the tape is still on the measure surface. I like this better than my old Stanley.
customer_reviews.author: M. Si

customer_reviews.title: Love the self lock feature
customer_reviews.text: Love the self locking feature, but if you're going to be measuring in dusty/dirty areas a lot and the tape gets dirty, the self locking rubber will slowly release the tape. It doesn't grab as tightly after a while. Had the first one for years until I left it at home depot. I got used to it slowly releasing, maybe like an eighth of an inch per second. Wasn't enough to deter me from getting another one, keeping the current one cleaner and the lock is working well. Great deal, paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bert

customer_reviews.title: These can take a beating and still work
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few months and I swear it's taken a beating falling 20 ft... Was ran over once and dropped countless times and no issues with it , where other ones would have stopped working on me...I'm surprised how good it's built.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone W. Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great for old timers.
customer_reviews.text: Love the clear large numbers and markings, very easy to read and to extend out and lock for measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 6 months...
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a solid tape measure but the first one broke in less than 6 months of use...and I rarely use these things - I bought 3 of these November 2017 so I could always find one when I needed it. The internal spring broke so it won't go back in...kind of a bummer b/c they seem pretty solid otherwise...
customer_reviews.author: davcall

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it’s a tap measure
customer_reviews.text: I am not a contractor, just a home owner, so not used continuously. At first ok. Just beware of the tape retraction. It whips back. The thing actually whipped around and cut my hand. Today, the tape started retracting while in a locked position. Next time, I will just buy a Stanley.
customer_reviews.author: beach bum

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly tape measure.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Like the automatic locking. Easy to read. Well worth the money for general use. Don't know about heavy everyday use. A contractor would probably know that.
customer_reviews.author: Bew

customer_reviews.title: Great tape measure!
customer_reviews.text: My old faithful tape measure finally broke/fell apart so I ordered this one! Bigger than I thought and it’s nice and sturdy. Tape will stay out and not snap you like my old one. Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Better than the cheap ones
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tape measure. Quality seems good and the locking mechanism works smoothly. The tape itself is strong and hold straight upto 6-8 feet, after which it starts bowing. But for the price, this seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Kapash

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this measuring tape. We were expecting it to have both inches and cm, not just inches, But that's probably just because we are used to that. Numbers are easy to read and tape is sturdy with the locking mechanism working perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Jess C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tape measure
customer_reviews.text: Needed a tape measure and this fit the bill perfectly. I keep it in my kitchen for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: SNDYGRL

customer_reviews.title: People will try to steal this... because it's just that good.
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and reliable. I constantly need to keep an eye on it, because everyone seems to want it. I love the lock feature, but takes some getting use to. If you are a mechanic, it works just like the Snap-On tape measurements work - just extremely cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Priest

customer_reviews.title: ITEM ANALYSIS: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This tape measure will do what it needs to do, which is measuring objects. When you pull the tape measure out it automatically locks the tape measure so it doesn't move. Then when you press the green button on top it turns off the locking mechanic and the tape measure goes in. Its like any other tape measure and worthy of its price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Doo

customer_reviews.title: Damn near perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. The locking mechanism in the 16ft. Tape is kind of weak, however, the one in the 25ft tape is strong and holds the blade without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chip A. Ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tape measure. I LOVE LOVE LOVE the self lock feature. It doesn’t take two people to measure with this. Yay! Great visibile color and nice heft.
customer_reviews.author: jolis

product_meta.title: Komelon SL2825 Self Lock 25-Foot Power Tape
product_meta.description:
416-SL2825 Features: -Self locking mechanism allows blade to be extended smoothly. -Push button allows blade to be retracted smoothly. -Nylon coated blade for maximum durability. -Impact resistant rubberized case. Product Type: -Tapes. Dimensions: Overall Product Weight: -0.83 Pounds.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Self Lock Series of tape measures is a unique line of tape measures. The series features 12-foot x 5/8-inch, 16-foot x 3/4-inch, 16-foot x 1-inch, 25-foot x 1-inch, 25-foot x 1-inch inch/Engineer scale. The Self Lock Series features a unique self locking mechanism that allows the blade to extend smoothly as well as a push button release that insures complete control when retracting the blade. This is the ideal measuring tool for anyone from the do it yourselfer to a professional tradesmen. The series also provides an impact resistant rubberized case and a nylon coated blade for maximum durability.
feature_bullets: Self locking mechanism allows blade to be extended smoothly
Push button allows blade to be retracted smoothly
Nylon coated blade for maximum durability

specifications.Included Components: Komelon SL2825 Self Lock 25-Foot Power Tape
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,309 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
